import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Register.css' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function () { const [student, setStudent] = useState({ name : "", email : "", password : "" }) const { name, email, password } = student; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setStudent({ ...student, [name] : value }) } const handleRegister = async (e) => { const {name, email, password} = student e.preventDefault(); await axios.post('http://localhost:4000/register', student) .then((result) => { console.log(result); }) alert("Registered"); } return ( <> {/* {console.log( "Student object",student)} */}
